strings.string: To ensure proper functioning, make sure to enable the xDrip Web-Server in your xDrip+ app (Settings - Inter-App Settings - enable xDrip Web-Server, but not the Open Web Server).

This value should be a number between 1 and 140
This value should be a whole number between 2 and 64
This value should be a whole number between 1 and 60
This value should be a hex number between 0x000000 and 0xffffff
This value should be a hex number between 0x000000 and 0xffffff
